languages.text: {n}Сквозь прутья клетки вы видите Блефа. Усмешка на его зловещей маске как будто стала еще шире — или это игра света? Мейв — белая, как саван, с темной ссадиной на лице — замерла рядом со скоморохом, едва заметно всхлипывая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сквозь прутья клетки вы видите Блефа. Усмешка на его зловещей маске как будто стала еще шире — или это игра света? Мейв — белая, как саван, — замерла рядом со скоморохом, едва заметно всхлипывая. Колье из тассерция все еще горит холодным светом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь прутья клетки вы видите Блефа. Усмешка на его зловещей маске как будто стала еще шире — или это игра света? Мейв — белая, как саван, с темной ссадиной на лице — замерла рядом со скоморохом, едва заметно всхлипывая.{/n}

{n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

languages.text: {n}通过笼子的栅栏，你看到了闹闹。他阴险的面具上，嘲弄的笑容似乎变得更加明显，还是说这仅仅是光线造成的错觉？至于梅芙，她的脸像床单一样白，脸上带着一块黑色的擦伤。她一动不动地站在小丑身边，静静地流着眼泪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}通过笼子的栅栏，你看到了闹闹。他阴险的面具上，嘲弄的笑容似乎变得更加明显，还是说这仅仅是光线造成的错觉？至于梅芙，她的脸像床单一样白，脸上带着一块黑色的擦伤。她一动不动地站在小丑身边，静静地流着眼泪。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ves a Farol a través de los barrotes de la jaula. La sonrisa burlona de su siniestra máscara parece ahora más amplia, ¿o se trata quizá de una ilusión óptica? Maive, blanca como el mármol y con una fea abrasión en la cara, solloza quedamente junto al bufón.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves a Farol a través de los barrotes de la jaula. La sonrisa burlona de su siniestra máscara parece ahora más amplia, ¿o se trata quizá de una ilusión óptica? Maive, blanca como el mármol y con una fea abrasión en la cara, solloza quedamente junto al bufón.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kurusıkı'yı kafesin parmaklıkları arasından görüyorsun. Uğursuz maskesindeki alaycı gülümseme daha da genişliyor gibi görünüyor. Yoksa bu bir ışık oyunu mu? Bembeyaz kesilmiş, yüzünde koyu bir sıyrık olan Maive; soytarının yanında kımıldamadan dururken sessizce ağlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kurusıkı'yı kafesin parmaklıkları arasından görüyorsun. Uğursuz maskesindeki alaycı gülümseme daha da genişliyor gibi görünüyor. Yoksa bu bir ışık oyunu mu? Bembeyaz kesilmiş, yüzünde koyu bir sıyrık olan Maive; soytarının yanında kımıldamadan dururken sessizce ağlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}檻の棒の向こうにブラフを見つける。彼の邪悪な仮面の嘲るような笑いはさらに大きくなったように見えるが、光のせいだろうか？メイヴは、血の気なく、彼女の顔に黒い擦り傷があり、その道化のそばでじっとして静かになく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}檻の棒の向こうにブラフを見つける。彼の邪悪な仮面の嘲るような笑いはさらに大きくなったように見えるが、光のせいだろうか？メイヴは、血の気なく、彼女の顔に黒い擦り傷があり、その道化のそばでじっとして静かになく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À travers les barreaux de la cage, vous discernez Bluff. Serait-ce un effet de la lumière, ou le sourire moqueur qui orne son masque serait-il plus étiré que jamais... ? Vous ne sauriez dire. Maive, blanche comme un linge malgré l'écorchure sombre sur son visage, pleure silencieusement aux côtés du bouffon, visiblement incapable de ne serait-ce que lever le petit doigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À travers les barreaux de la cage, vous discernez Bluff. Serait-ce un effet de la lumière, ou le sourire moqueur qui orne son masque serait-il plus étiré que jamais... ? Vous ne sauriez dire. Maive, blanche comme un linge malgré l'écorchure sombre sur son visage, pleure silencieusement aux côtés du bouffon, visiblement incapable de ne serait-ce que lever le petit doigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du siehst Bluff durch die Stäbe eines Käfigs. Das spöttische Lächeln auf seiner finsteren Maske ist noch breiter geworden, oder ist das nur eine Täuschung durch das Licht? Maive, weiß wie die Wand, mit einer Schürfwunde auf dem Gesicht, steht reglos neben dem Narren und weint leise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see Bluff through the bars of the cage. The mocking smile on his sinister mask seems to grow even broader, or is it a trick of the light? Maive — as white as a sheet, with a dark abrasion on her face — weeps quietly as she stands stock-still beside the fool.{/n}

Maive, weiß wie die Wand, mit einer Schürfwunde auf dem Gesicht, steht reglos neben dem Narren und weint leise.{/n}
